price: 28. Le plus sage d’entre eux dit alors : «Ne vous avais-je pas dit de rendre gloire à Allah ? »
arabic: قَالَ أَوۡسَطُهُمۡ أَلَمۡ أَقُل لَّكُمۡ لَوۡلَا تُسَبِّحُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qāla awsaṭuhum alam aqul lakum lawlā tusabbiḥūna
